CheckVersion.name: CheckVersion
CheckVersion.description: Grants permission to IoT Device Tester to check if a given set of product, test suite and device tester version are compatible

DownloadTestSuite.name: DownloadTestSuite
DownloadTestSuite.description: Grants permission to IoT Device Tester to download compatible test suite versions

LatestIdt.name: LatestIdt
LatestIdt.description: Grants permission to IoT Device Tester to get information on latest version of device tester available

SendMetrics.name: SendMetrics
SendMetrics.description: Grants permission to IoT Device Tester to send usage metrics on your behalf

SupportedVersion.name: SupportedVersion
SupportedVersion.description: Grants permission to IoT Device Tester to get list of supported products and test suite versions
